Name: 遇见猎人
About the game: 64 square kilometers of open world, magic stone with supreme magic burst in the air, debris scattered around the world with sky fire. Affected by the erosion of magic stone fragments, countless demons were derived and left to the mainland. As the blizzard city guard, you will start from the place of rebirth, looking for partners and children, joining the blizzard city guard, checking the main city stronghold, looking for five elements to build the world. Fight for freedom and Blizzard City, use your sword to pierce all beliefs. If you venture into the western regions, the God of hell and the God of nine pillars will not be able to block your way forward. Finally, expose the hypocrisy of the Lord of the city and destroy the magic wand. This time, it's no longer for Blizzard city. In the name of the spirit God, you will lead your partner to a foreign land on the sea and start again in the name of love. Witness the sword demon's persistence to his lover, the giant God's challenge to God's unyielding faith, the eternal King's salvation Road, and the conspiracy hidden in the dark The warrior takes the sword in your hand and draws the sword for your guardian. New journey, new biography of the devil, we will meet in this lost continent!
